name: py-setuptools-scm

variants.name: build_system

description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-ford
dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.

dependent_to.name: py-pacifica-namespace
dependent_to.description: Python Pacifica Namespace Library

dependent_to.name: py-linear-operator
dependent_to.description:
A linear operator implementation, primarily designed for finite-
dimensional positive definite operators (i.e. kernel matrices).

dependent_to.name: py-stack-data
dependent_to.description:
Extract data from python stack frames and tracebacks for informative
displays.

dependent_to.name: py-nest-asyncio
dependent_to.description: Patch asyncio to allow nested event loops.

dependent_to.name: py-automat
dependent_to.description: Self-service finite-state machines for the programmer on the go.

dependent_to.name: py-scanpy
dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.

dependent_to.name: py-apipkg
dependent_to.description: apipkg: namespace control and lazy-import mechanism

dependent_to.name: py-tempora
dependent_to.description: Objects and routines pertaining to date and time (tempora)

dependent_to.name: py-jaraco-classes
dependent_to.description: Utility functions for Python class constructs

dependent_to.name: py-keyring
dependent_to.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.

dependent_to.name: py-asteval
dependent_to.description: Safe, minimalistic evaluator of python expression using ast module

dependent_to.name: py-humanize
dependent_to.description:
This modest package contains various common humanization utilities, like
turning a number into a fuzzy human readable duration ('3 minutes ago')
or into a human readable size or throughput. It works with python 2.7
and 3.3 and is localized to Russian, French, Korean and Slovak.

dependent_to.name: py-hist
dependent_to.description: Hist classes and utilities

dependent_to.name: py-typeguard
dependent_to.description: Run-time type checker for Python

dependent_to.name: py-spatialist
dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-forked
dependent_to.description: Run tests in isolated forked subprocesses.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-rust
dependent_to.description: Setuptools rust extension plugin.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-cartopy
dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.

dependent_to.name: py-hepunits
dependent_to.description: Units and constants in the HEP system of units.

dependent_to.name: py-mpmath
dependent_to.description: A Python library for arbitrary-precision floating-point arithmetic.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-html
dependent_to.description:
pytest-html is a plugin for pytest that generates a HTML report for test
results

dependent_to.name: py-prettytable
dependent_to.description:
PrettyTable is a simple Python library designed to make it quick and
easy to represent tabular data in visually appealing ASCII tables.

dependent_to.name: py-dnaio
dependent_to.description: Read and write FASTQ and FASTA

dependent_to.name: py-gpytorch
dependent_to.description:
GPyTorch is a Gaussian process library implemented using PyTorch.
GPyTorch is designed for creating scalable, flexible, and modular
Gaussian process models with ease.

dependent_to.name: py-configparser
dependent_to.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependent_to.name: py-cheroot
dependent_to.description: Highly-optimized, pure-python HTTP server

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependent_to.name: py-histoprint
dependent_to.description: Pretty print of NumPy (and other) histograms to the console

dependent_to.name: py-execnet
dependent_to.description:
execnet provides a share-nothing model with channel-send/receive
communication for distributing execution across many Python interpreters
across version, platform and network barriers.

dependent_to.name: py-hatch-vcs
dependent_to.description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS

dependent_to.name: py-pyusb
dependent_to.description: Easy USB access from Python.

dependent_to.name: py-py
dependent_to.description: Library with cross-python path, ini-parsing, io, code, log facilities

dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv
dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.

dependent_to.name: py-pluggy
dependent_to.description: Plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python.

dependent_to.name: py-tenacity
dependent_to.description: Retrying library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-arm-pyart
dependent_to.description:
Python ARM Radar Toolkit. A growing collection of weather radar
algorithms and utilities build on top of the Scientific Python stack and
distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license. Py-ART is used by the
Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Climate Research Facility for
working with data from a number of precipitation and cloud radars, but
has been designed so that it can be used by others in the radar and
atmospheric communities to examine, processes, and analyse data from
many types of weather radars.

dependent_to.name: pacifica-cli
dependent_to.description: Python CLI for Pacifica Core Services

dependent_to.name: py-vector
dependent_to.description: Vector classes and utilities

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build
dependent_to.description:
scikit-build is an improved build system generator for CPython
C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It provides better support for
additional compilers, build systems, cross compilation, and locating
dependencies and their associated build requirements. The scikit-build
package is fundamentally just glue between the setuptools Python module
and CMake.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-qt
dependent_to.description:
A pytest plugin that allows programmers to write tests for PySide,
PySide2 and PyQt applications.

dependent_to.name: py-plotnine
dependent_to.description:
plotnine is an implementation of a grammar of graphics in Python, it is
based on ggplot2. The grammar allows users to compose plots by
explicitly mapping data to the visual objects that make up the plot.

dependent_to.name: py-cppy
dependent_to.description: C++ headers for C extension development

dependent_to.name: py-lz4
dependent_to.description: lz4 (compression library) bindings for Python

dependent_to.name: py-reproject
dependent_to.description:
The reproject package is a Python package to reproject astronomical
images using various techniques via a uniform interface. By
reprojection, we mean the re-gridding of images from one world
coordinate system to another (for example changing the pixel resolution,
orientation, coordinate system). Currently, we have implemented
reprojection of celestial images by interpolation (like SWARP), as well
as by finding the exact overlap between pixels on the celestial sphere
(like Montage). It can also reproject to/from HEALPIX projections by
relying on the astropy-healpix package.

dependent_to.name: py-pint
dependent_to.description:
Pint is a Python package to define, operate and manipulate physical
quantities: the product of a numerical value and a unit of measurement.
It allows arithmetic operations between them and conversions from and to
different units.

dependent_to.name: py-pacifica-downloader
dependent_to.description: Python Pacifica Download Library

dependent_to.name: py-python-certifi-win32
dependent_to.description:
This package patches certifi at runtime to also include certificates
from the windows certificate store.

dependent_to.name: py-tqdm
dependent_to.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependent_to.name: py-auditwheel
dependent_to.description:
Auditing and relabeling of PEP 600 manylinux_x_y, PEP 513 manylinux1,
PEP 571 manylinux2010 and PEP 599 manylinux2014 Linux wheels.

dependent_to.name: py-zarr
dependent_to.description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.

dependent_to.name: py-boost-histogram
dependent_to.description: The Boost::Histogram Python wrapper.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-doctestplus
dependent_to.description: Pytest plugin with advanced doctest features.

dependent_to.name: py-xarray
dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-cherrypy
dependent_to.description: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented HTTP framework.

dependent_to.name: py-backports-cached-property
dependent_to.description: cached_property() - computed once per instance, cached as attribute

dependent_to.name: py-dictdiffer
dependent_to.description:
Dictdiffer is a helper module that helps you to diff and patch
dictionares.

dependent_to.name: py-ujson
dependent_to.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-lazy-object-proxy
dependent_to.description: A fast and thorough lazy object proxy.

dependent_to.name: py-zipfile-deflate64
dependent_to.description: Extract Deflate64 ZIP archives with Python's zipfile API.

dependent_to.name: py-fava
dependent_to.description:
Fava is a web interface for the double-entry bookkeeping software
Beancount with a focus on features and usability.

dependent_to.name: py-bcolz
dependent_to.description:
bcolz provides columnar and compressed data containers. Column storage
allows for efficiently querying tables with a large number of columns.
It also allows for cheap addition and removal of column. In addition,
bcolz objects are compressed by default for reducing memory/disk I/O
needs. The compression process is carried out internally by Blosc, a
high-performance compressor that is optimized for binary data.

dependent_to.name: py-python-xlib
dependent_to.description:
The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client
library for Python programs. It is written entirely in Python, in
contrast to earlier X libraries for Python (the ancient X extension and
the newer plxlib) which were interfaces to the C Xlib.

dependent_to.name: py-metpy
dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.

dependent_to.name: py-mplhep
dependent_to.description: Matplotlib styles for HEP

dependent_to.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependent_to.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm-git-archive
dependent_to.description:
This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).

dependent_to.name: py-salib
dependent_to.description: Python implementations of commonly used sensitivity analysis methods.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-mock
dependent_to.description: Thin-wrapper around the mock package for easier use with py.test

dependent_to.name: py-pyerfa
dependent_to.description:
PyERFA is the Python wrapper for the ERFA library (Essential Routines
for Fundamental Astronomy), a C library containing key algorithms for
astronomy, which is based on the SOFA library published by the
International Astronomical Union (IAU). All C routines are wrapped as
Numpy universal functions, so that they can be called with scalar or
array inputs.

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-fracridge
dependent_to.description: Fractional Ridge Regression.

dependent_to.name: py-anyio
dependent_to.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependent_to.name: py-numcodecs
dependent_to.description:
Numcodecs is a Python package providing buffer compression and
transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-xopen
dependent_to.description:
This small Python module provides a xopen function that works like the
built-in open function, but can also deal with compressed files.
Supported compression formats are gzip, bzip2 and xz. They are
automatically recognized by their file extensions .gz, .bz2 or .xz.

dependent_to.name: py-anndata
dependent_to.description:
anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in
memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.

dependent_to.name: py-pacifica-uploader
dependent_to.description: Python Pacifica Uploader Library

dependent_to.name: py-pooch
dependent_to.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.

dependent_to.name: py-nitransforms
dependent_to.description: NiTransforms -- Neuroimaging spatial transforms in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pure-eval
dependent_to.description: Safely evaluate AST nodes without side effects.

dependent_to.name: py-jaraco-functools
dependent_to.description: Functools like those found in stdlib

dependent_to.name: py-keyrings-alt
dependent_to.description: Alternate keyring implementations

dependent_to.name: py-backports-entry-points-selectable
dependent_to.description:
Compatibility shim providing selectable entry points for older
implementations

dependent_to.name: py-jsonpickle
dependent_to.description: Python library for serializing any arbitrary object graph into JSON.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-asyncio
dependent_to.description:
pytest-asyncio is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for
testing asyncio code with pytest.

dependent_to.name: py-asttokens
dependent_to.description: Annotate AST trees with source code positions.

dependent_to.name: py-twine
dependent_to.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: py-executing
dependent_to.description: Get the currently executing AST node of a frame, and other information.

dependent_to.name: py-acme-tiny
dependent_to.description: A tiny script to issue and renew TLS certs from Let's Encrypt.

dependent_to.name: py-shtab
dependent_to.description: Automatically generate shell tab completion scripts for python CLI apps.

dependent_to.name: py-importlib-resources
dependent_to.description: Read resources from Python packages

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pylint
dependent_to.description: python code static checker

dependent_to.name: py-zipp
dependent_to.description: Backport of pathlib-compatible object wrapper for zip files.

dependent_to.name: py-pdoc3
dependent_to.description: Auto-generate API documentation for Python projects.

dependent_to.name: py-kiwisolver
dependent_to.description: A fast implementation of the Cassowary constraint solver

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-runner
dependent_to.description: Invoke py.test as distutils command with dependency resolution.

dependent_to.name: py-python-dateutil
dependent_to.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependent_to.name: py-templateflow
dependent_to.description: A python client to query TemplateFlow via pyBIDS.

dependent_to.name: py-backports-os
dependent_to.description: Backport of new features in Python's os module

dependent_to.name: py-cutadapt
dependent_to.description:
Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and
other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing
reads.

dependent_to.name: py-platformdirs
dependent_to.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"

dependent_to.name: py-correctionlib
dependent_to.description: A generic correction library

dependent_to.name: py-mplhep-data
dependent_to.description: Font (Data) sub-package for mplhep

dependent_to.name: hicops
dependent_to.description:
HiCOPS is a software framework for accelerating database peptide search
workflows on supercomputers. HiCOPS provided algorithm-independent
parallelizations and optimizations can be extended into new HPC database
search algorithms or scalably accelerate the existing ones.

dependent_to.name: py-filelock
dependent_to.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependent_to.name: py-portend
dependent_to.description: TCP port monitoring and discovery

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-cpp
dependent_to.description: Use pytest runner to discover and execute C++ tests.

dependent_to.name: py-python-lsp-server
dependent_to.description: A Python 3.7+ implementation of the Language Server Protocol.

dependent_to.name: py-tomopy
dependent_to.description:
TomoPy is an open-source Python package for tomographic data processing
and image reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi-bindings
dependent_to.description: Low-level CFFI bindings for Argon2.

dependent_to.name: py-botorch
dependent_to.description: BoTorch is a library for Bayesian Optimization built on PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-pyarrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.

dependent_to.name: py-dcm2bids
dependent_to.description:
Reorganising NIfTI files from dcm2niix into the Brain Imaging Data
Structure.

dependent_to.name: py-emcee
dependent_to.description:
emcee is an MIT licensed pure-Python implementation of Goodman & Weare's
Affine Invariant Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) Ensemble sampler.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-metadata
dependent_to.description: pytest plugin for test session metadata

dependent_to.name: py-photutils
dependent_to.description:
Photutils is an Astropy package for detection and photometry of
astronomical sources.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-ml
dependent_to.description: Scalable Machine Learning with Dask.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-autodoc-typehints
dependent_to.description: Type hints (PEP 484) support for the Sphinx autodoc extension

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-openfiles
dependent_to.description:
A plugin for the pytest framework that allows developers to detect
whether any file handles or other file-like objects were inadvertently
left open at the end of a unit test

dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema
dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
